text: okay we need to talk about cheating and
art every day i get dozens of comments
from young artists asking if what
they're doing in their art is considered
cheating the short answer is no there is
no such thing as cheating in art it's
art need to trace something to get the
likenesses just so do it it's not
cheating need to use a stencil for your
art have at it it's not cheating using
photo reference for your art omg no it's
still not cheating every artist
throughout time has used any and all
tools available to them to make the best
art they can so use whatever tools you
need to make your art whatever you need
it's not how you get there it's the
final work that matters now there's
theft and that's not good don't copy
another person's art exactly and claim
it as yours that's bad but other than
that please stop listening to your best
friend or your parents or someone you've
never met on the internet who tells you
that there are rules to making art
there's just one rule and one rule only
in art and that is to have fun
